title: #1: Stuck in the Riddle with You
itunes:title: #1: Stuck in the Riddle with You
description:
It’s our debut episode! Riddles include a dad trying his best to be hip, a shady ass phone call, a child that’s happy as hell to be kicked out of the house and a mysterious mass death! It’s a podcast you can play along with so FLEX DAT BRAIN!

Starring:

Adal Rifai

John Patrick Coan

Erin Keif

Editing by: 

KJ Snyder

Theme by: 

Arne Parrott

Logo by: 

Emily Kardamis & Emmaline Morris

Want more? Get Weekly Bonus Eps on Patreon!

Want merch? Visit our TeePublic Store!

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
